vlearn.activity_cubes package¶

Submodules¶

vlearn.activity_cubes.cubes module¶

class vlearn.activity_cubes.cubes.ActCubes(rdir, gt_csv_name)¶

Bases: vlearn.vid_reader.VReader

cubes = None¶

Data frame having activity cube information

extract_activity_cubes(frames=30, out_dir='')¶

Trims activity cubes and stores them as videos. For writing and nowriting wenjing suggested to use 30 frames or 1 second. :param frames: Number of frames in each cube. :type frames: int :param out_dir: Output location of trimmed videos. If not passed videos

are generated at the same location as video (csv file).

Parameters

np_array (boolen) – When true generates a numpy array for all the trimmed videos.

extract_activity_cubes_as_np_arrays(frames=30, out_dir='')¶

Trims activity cubes and stores them as videos. For writing and nowriting wenjing suggested to use 30 frames or 1 second. :param frames: Number of frames in each cube. :type frames: int :param out_dir: Output location of trimmed videos. If not passed videos

are generated at the same location as video (csv file).

Parameters

np_array (boolen) – When true generates a numpy array for all the trimmed videos.

plot_properties()¶
Description:

Creates histogram of width, height and number of frames. These histograms are returned as list of axis handles. To view them please use plt.imshow()

rdir = None¶

Root directory having ground truth csv file and videos

class vlearn.activity_cubes.ActCubes(rdir, gt_csv_name)¶

Bases: vlearn.vid_reader.VReader

cubes = None¶

Data frame having activity cube information

extract_activity_cubes(frames=30, out_dir='')¶

Trims activity cubes and stores them as videos. For writing and nowriting wenjing suggested to use 30 frames or 1 second. :param frames: Number of frames in each cube. :type frames: int :param out_dir: Output location of trimmed videos. If not passed videos

are generated at the same location as video (csv file).

Parameters

np_array (boolen) – When true generates a numpy array for all the trimmed videos.

extract_activity_cubes_as_np_arrays(frames=30, out_dir='')¶

Trims activity cubes and stores them as videos. For writing and nowriting wenjing suggested to use 30 frames or 1 second. :param frames: Number of frames in each cube. :type frames: int :param out_dir: Output location of trimmed videos. If not passed videos

are generated at the same location as video (csv file).

Parameters

np_array (boolen) – When true generates a numpy array for all the trimmed videos.

plot_properties()¶
Description:

Creates histogram of width, height and number of frames. These histograms are returned as list of axis handles. To view them please use plt.imshow()

rdir = None¶

Root directory having ground truth csv file and videos
